title: Betatype.com Updated
content: So I finally updated [Betatype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024043351/http:/betatype.com/). For the time being I'm using it as a project log. I find I'm more motivated to make fonts when I share my progress. Feel free to stop by and take a look at what I've been working on.
author: Christian Robertson

comments.content: Nice. I'm looking forward to seeing more of your fonts released.
Well done. I think you will only benefit from disclosure, both from the process of documenting your work, and the feedback from visitors.
Nice update, Christian. Here's to getting more fonts out from Betatype!

Oh good ... now I'll have lots of specific items to pester you about finishing.

Nice to see designs in action again. Huzzah!
very cool, christian. good to see there's more innovative stuff in the pipeline!
